tasks.play: Build self-service template and survey based on current information

survey_spec.description: General questions to provision volumes on IBM FlashSystem
survey_spec.name: flashsystem_update

spec.question_description: Volume names will be constructed as basename+sequence number. Choose your base name here
spec.question_name: What base name will you be using for the volumes before sequence numbers?

spec.question_description: Volumes names are constructed as basename_sequence number. Choose which number you want to use as your starting point
spec.question_name: What number will the volume sequence numbers being with
How many volumes do you want?

spec.question_description: you may choose an increment other than 1 for counting
spec.question_name: By how much will the volume numbers increment?

spec.question_description: Select one storage pool from the list
spec.question_name: What storage pool will be used?

spec.question_description: The default will be for the volume to be fully provisioned. Would you like to have it be thin provisioned instead?
spec.question_name: Should the volume be Thin Provisioned?

spec.question_description: Choose the units that you want to size your capacity in
spec.question_name: What unit will you size capacity in?

spec.question_description: choose the number of storage units that you will configure in each volume
spec.question_name: How many units of capacity per volume?
